name: Mabroom Dates
description: Mabroom dates are elongated with a beautiful deep reddish-brown color. They have a firm yet chewy texture with a uniquely rich, sweet flavor and subtle toffee notes.
characteristics: Elongated shape, reddish-brown, firm and chewy, toffee notes

packaging.naturalClaim: 100% NATURAL - No added Sugars, No Preservatives, No Additives

terroir.geography: Al-Qassim region of Saudi Arabia, renowned for premium date cultivation
terroir.climate: Hot, dry desert climate creating unique texture and flavor profile
terroir.soil: Desert soil that produces dates with distinctive elongated shape and reddish hue
terroir.whySpecial: Mabroom dates are distinguished by their elongated shape and reddish-brown color. Less common than Medjoul but highly prized by date connoisseurs for their unique chewy texture and caramel-toffee flavor.

originStory: Mabroom dates from Saudi Arabia's Al-Qassim region are distinguished by their elongated shape and reddish-brown color. The hot, dry climate creates dates with a chewy, slightly fibrous texture and rich, caramel-toffee flavor. Mabroom dates are less common than Medjoul but highly prized by date connoisseurs for their unique character and depth.
tastingNotes: Caramel-toffee flavor, chewy texture, reddish-brown color, slightly fibrous which adds textural interest
whyWeCare: For the date connoisseur who's tasted everything, Mabroom offers a unique profile that stands apart from mainstream varieties. Al-Qassim terroir creates character you won't find elsewhere.
customerInsight: Rated 3.8/5 - quality can vary batch-to-batch (we're working on consistency), but when good, customers love the unique taste

benefits.detail: Known for exceptional taste and texture

nutritionalHighlights.reason: Called the 'crown jewel' for its exceptional quality, rich flavor, and premium nutritional profile.
